raw_comment: I notice that clean energy has been taking up more and more of a fraction, but every single method of electricity has increased over the years, likely because of an increase of population and an increase of areas with electricity over the years.  I wonder if there's going to be a bigger shift towards clean energy in the future that will shift the ratios of energy usage.  This relates to my community because we use a lot of gas, but we also have wind farms and solar farms here as well.  A headline could be "What Kind Of Energy Does The World Use?"
ace_sentences: Clean energy has taken up an increasing fraction over the years.
Every method of electricity generation has increased over the years.
The population has increased over the years.
The number of areas with electricity has increased over the years.
The increase in population likely causes the increase in electricity generation.
The increase in areas with electricity likely causes the increase in electricity generation.
I wonder if there will be a bigger shift toward clean energy in the future.
If there is a bigger shift toward clean energy, then the ratios of energy usage will change.
This comment relates to my community.
The headline could be: What kind of energy does the world use?
